item.title: Asciinema
item.description: asciinema command-line records terminal sessions. You DON’T need to create account on asciinema.org to use this tool. In order to install asciinema command-line, use following command: $ brew install asciinema In order to record terminal sessions into session.json file, launch following command: $ asciinema rec session.json For further information, see asciinema’s usage page.

item.title: Youtube Downloader
item.description: youtube-dl command could be used to download video file from Youtube and Youtube like website. In order to install youtube-dl command-line, use following commands $ brew install youtube-dl In order to be imported into Slides As Code, download MP4 format $ youtube-dl -f mp4 <url> For further information, see youtube-dl’s documentation page.
